loans.name: Chanthy

texts.en:
Chanthy (in the photo) is 31 years old and her husband, Ny, is 30 years old. They live in a village about 17 km from Phnom Penh City and they have three children: two sons and one daughter. Two of the children are in school and another one is still young.   

Chanthy sells fruit and her husband is a construction worker. Chanthy carries fruit on her motorbike, but the motorbike is old and uses more gasoline than the new ones.  Hence, she decided to apply for a loan of $1,000 to purchase a new motorcycle.

loans.use: To purchase a new motorcycle.

loans.name: Ramatou

texts.fr:
Née vers Juin 1967 à Bobo Dioulasso (Burkina Faso), Madame Ramatou est mariée et mère de six enfants. Elle vit avec son époux et leurs enfants à Hamdallaye, un des  quartiers populaires de la ville de Sikasso.
Madame Ramatou mène cette activité d’achat et de vente de condiments il y a plus de  trente ans, depuis très jeune, auprès de sa maman. 
Dans le souci de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle qui ne cessait d’accroitre, elle décida de collaborer avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso il y a environ sept ans. Après plusieurs  prêts solidaires (prêt du groupe) avec une association des femmes à Kadiolo Noumousso elle est maintenant au 5ème prêt individuel, tous ses prêts précédents ont été correctement remboursés. 
Avec ce présent prêt, elle compte acheter, 15 cartons de concentrée de tomate, 8 cartons de magie, 5 sacs de graine de poivre, 4 sacs d’oignon séchés, 3 sacs de feuilles de Lorié et 8 cartons de moutarde au grand marché de Sikasso. Elle compte revendre ses marchandises en gros,  en détail, au comptant et à crédit à une clientèle composée de détaillantes du nouveau marché de Médine où elle mène son activité et aux consommateurs. 
Avec ce prêt, elle envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 120 000 FCFA qui sera utiliser pour contribuer aux dépenses familiales, payer les intérêts de son prêt et investir le reste dans son activité. 
Elle ambitionne devenir une grossiste au niveau du marché où elle opère afin de servir les détaillantes de ce marché qui ont souvent du mal à s’approvisionner facilement.
texts.en:
Ramatou was born around June 1967 in Bobo Dioulasso (Burkina Faso).  She is married and the mother of six children.  She lives with her husband and children in Hamdallaye, one of the working-class neighborhoods of the city of Sikasso.

Ramatou has been buying and selling condiments for over thirty years.  She started this activity when she was very young, alongside her mother.  In order to better meet the needs of an increasing number of customers, she decided to join the micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso about seven years ago.  After several solidarity loans (group loans) taken with a women's association in Kadiolo Noumousso, she is now on to her fifth individual loan.  All her previous loans have been duly repaid.

With this current loan, she is planning to buy 15 boxes of tomato concentrate, 8 boxes of Maggi cubes, 5 bags of pepper grains, 4 bags of dried onions, 3 bags of laurel leaves and 8 boxes of mustard at the Grand Market in Sikasso.  She is planning to resell her merchandise for retail or wholesale, for cash or on credit, to customers who are consumers or retailers themselves. She will do so at the new market in Médine where she is already reselling.

With her loan, Ramatou is expecting monthly profits to reach 120,000 CFA francs, which will be used to contribute to family expenses, pay off her loan's interest and invest the rest in her activity.  

Her ambition is to become a wholesaler on the market where she currently works, in order to serve the retailers of that market who are often having a hard time accessing supplies.

loans.use: to buy condiments.

loans.name: Karakyz

texts.ru:
Каракыз 55 лет, пенсионерка. С 1998 года Каракыз занимается животноводством, служащего в качестве основного источника дохода для ее семьи. Благодаря упорству и настойчивости Каракыз, начатое с суммы в 10,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство  на сегодня приносит около 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц с продажи молочных и мясных продуктов. На сегодня ее хозяйство насчитывает 10 овец, 6 дойных коров, 2 теленка  и 2 кобылы. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Каракыз обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 90,000 сом (KGS) на покупку породистых пород овец. Доходы Каракыз планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en:
Karakyz is 55 years old and retired.  Since 1998 she has been in animal husbandry, which serves as the main source of income for her family.  Thanks to her tenacity and perseverance, the business she began with 10,000 soum (KGS) now brings in about 15,000 soum per month from the sale of dairy and meat products.  Today she has 10 sheep, 6 milk cows, 2 calves, and 2 mares.  

With the goal of further development of her business, Karakyz turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 90,000 soum (KGS) for the purchase of purebred breeds of sheep.  Karakyz is planning to invest the income in further growing her operation.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Wilmar

texts.es:
Wilmar de 31 años de edad convive con Maribel de 27 años fruto de esta relación tienen dos hijos. Juntos viven en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito de Pichari. Wilmar es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante y cuyo fin es demostrar a su familia que con esfuerzo y  dedicación en su trabajo todo se puede lograr en esta vida. Él se dedica al servicio de taxi en la localidad de Pichari desde los 19 años, al inicio empezó con una mototaxi de segunda, poco tiempo después accedió a un crédito de MFP donde le facilitaron un crédito con el que compró una mototaxi nueva  con la que ahora trabaja. 
Cuenta que en estos tres últimos años la competencia se ha incrementado  por el que Wilmar se encuentra preocupado ya que las ganancias no son como antes, es por ello que Wilmar esta pensando abrir una tienda de abarrotes con la finalidad de mantener  el bienestar económico de su familia.
Wilmar también cuenta con una parcela agrícola con plantaciones de cacao que también es su fuente de ingreso, pues siempre fue un hombre de múltiples oficios, por tanto no se dificulta en ningún trabajo.
Wilmar esta contento con el trabajo que tiene a pesar de la competencia siempre la bendición esta presente. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que él se compromete en una vez más en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Wilmar esta contento con el trabajo que realizan en su banco comunal, por que todos son puntuales. Con los 500 nuevos soles realizará la compra de nuevo toldo para su mototaxi
texts.en:
Wilmar, 31 years old, lives with Maribel, 27 years old, with whom he has two children. They live together in their own house, located in the Pichari district. Wilmar is a young man with a great desire to get ahead; his goal is to demonstrate to his family that with effort and dedication in one's work, anything can be achieved in life. He has worked in taxi service in the area of Pichari since he was 19 years old. At the beginning, he started with a second-hand motorcycle taxi. A short time after that, he qualified for a loan from MFP, where they helped him get a loan that he used to purchase a new motorcycle taxi, which is the one that he uses for his work now.

He says that in the last three years, competition has increased. Because of this, Wilmar is worried, since his earnings are not as high as they used to be. This is why Wilmar is thinking about opening a grocery store, to maintain the financial welfare of his family. Wilmar also has a plot of farmland with cacao crops, which is also a source of income for him. He has always been a man of multiple trades, so he doesn't have problems with any type of work.

Wilmar is happy with the work that he has; in spite of the competition, it is always a blessing. This is his second loan with MFP, and he is committed to once again making his payments on time. Wilmar is satisfied with the work that is done in his communal bank, because everybody is punctual. With the 500 nuevos soles (PEN) he will purchase a new roof for his motorcycle taxi.

loans.use: to purchase a roof for his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Recher

texts.es:
Recher, de 31 años, en un joven alegre y trabajador; vive en su propia casa, junto a su madre Marcela, de 64 años, a quien estima y ayuda en los gastos de su hogar. La actividad que realiza Recher, es a labrar la tierra para luego cultivar plantas de  plátano, mango, naranja, mandarina, entre otros; actividad que realiza durante 25 años para poder ayudar a su estimada madre. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con la ayuda de jornaleros, de esa manera llega a extraer rápido sus frutos para luego llevarla a vender en la ciudad de san Francisco, a la gente que viaja para la ciudad de Ayacucho. Sin embargo considera difícil el no poder eliminar a las plagas que afectan sus frutales: ya que de esa forma no puede lograr a conseguir buena producción. Por lo tanto acude a MFP, para solicitar un préstamo que ayude con sus planes de trabajo y así no perjudique su producción. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, se siente contento por la confianza y por ende se compromete a pagar puntual sus cuotas de pago. Asimismo, agradece a su banco comunal por permitirles trabajar con personas responsables y solidarias.
Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará fungicidas y abono para que las plagas no afecten sus frutales.
texts.en:
Recher, 31, is a happy and hardworking young man. He lives in his own house with his mother, Marcela, 64, whom he esteems and helps with household expenses. Recher has been a cultivator for 25 years, helping his esteemed mother. He cultivates bananas, mangos, oranges, and mandarins, among others. At harvest time he relies on the help of day laborers so that he can quickly pick the fruit and take it to sell in the small town of San Francisco to the people who travel to the city of Ayacucho. 

Nonetheless Recher finds it difficult to eliminate pests that affect his crops and prevent a good production. Consequently he is coming to MFP to apply for a loan that will help his work plans and improve production. This will be his first loan with MFP and he is pleased at the confidence shown in him and is committed to making his payments on time. As well, he is grateful to his communal bank for enabling him to work with responsible and supportive people. With the 1,000 nuevos soles, he will buy fungicides and compost so that pests will not affect his fruit.

loans.use: to buy fungicides and compost.

loans.name: Chor Variyas

texts.en:
Chor Variyas and her husband, Mas Maut, live in a village about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh, and they have three sons and two daughters. One is a fisherman, two attend school, and the other two are still young.

Chor Variyas assists her husband in his business as a fisherman. When it is not the fishing season, he does construction work and drives a motor taxi. Chor Variyas is now requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase a new boat motor and more fishing nets.

loans.use: to purchase a new boat motor and more fishing nets.

loans.name: Phorn

texts.en:
Phorn is 55 years old, and her husband, Vun, is 60 years old. They live in a village near the Mekong River about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have two sons and four daughters; three are married and live in separate homes, one is a garment worker, another one is a tailor and another one stays at home. 

Phorn and her husband are farmers; they grow rice and sweet potatoes. She is asking for a loan in the amount of $700 to purchase seeds and fertilizer to maintain her farm.

In the photo, Phorn is at home, not at the farm.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and fertilizer to maintain her farm.

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.ru: Зулфия замужем и любящая мать двоих детей. Она очень трудолюбивая и добросовестная женщина. Более 10 лет она занимается купле- продажей скота. Кроме скотоводства занимается шитьем женских национальных платьев. В бизнесе помогает муж. Зулфия запрашивает займ для покупки пиломатериалов и постройки дома. Она надеется на вашу помощь
texts.en: Zulfiya is married and the loving mother of two children.  She is a very hardworking and honest woman.  For over 10 years she has been buying and selling cattle.  Besides animal husbandry, she also sews traditional women's dresses.  Her husband helps her with the business.  Zulfiya is requesting a loan to buy lumber for rebuilding her house.  She is relying on your help.

loans.use: to repair her house

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana de 48 años de edad, casado con nieves de 49 años fruto de esta relación tienen 2 hijos, ellos viven en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito de Pichari. Juana esta orgullosa por haber nacido en un país de muchas oportunidades. Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en su pequeña tienda, asimismo nos comenta que para lograr ser la tienda mas concurrida por sus clientes siempre ha tratado con amabilidad, mucha paciencia y lo mas importante los precios al alcance de todos.
Es por ello que ahora se ha posesionado bien en el mercado local, pero aun así no se siente a gusto por que piensa crecer y lograr convertirse en un centro comercial de su ciudad.
Lo más importante de su negocio son las ventas por que gracias a ello están los ingresos económicos con la que ella podrá incrementar más productos
Usualmente trabaja con el apoyo de su querido esposo e hijos quienes lo reemplazan mientras ella se va de compras a la ciudad de Huamanga de donde trae todo sus productos a un precio justo, cosa que depues de la reventa le deje ganancias. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que una vez más se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Ella esta a gusto con su banco comunal por que son buenos socios.
Con los 4.000 nuevos soles realizará la compra de más mercadería surtida para incrementar su negocio.
texts.en:
Juana, 48 years old, is married to 49-year-old Nieves, with whom she has two children. They live in their own house, located in the Pichari district. Juana is proud of being born in a country with a lot of opportunities. She works selling groceries in her small store. She says that in order to make her store the one most frequented by her customers, she is always friendly and patient, and, most importantly, offers prices that are within the reach of everybody.

This is why she is now well-positioned in the local market, but she still isn't satisfied; she is thinking about growing and becoming one of the city's commercial centers. The most important part of her business are the sales; thanks to that income, she is able to increase her product offerings. Usually she works with the help of her dear husband and children, who fill in when she goes shopping in the city of Huamanga, to bring back all of her products at a fair price. This leaves her with earnings once the products are re-sold. 

This is her second loan with MFP, and she is committed to making her payments on time once again. She is satisfied with her communal bank because they are good partners. With the 4,000 nuevos soles (PEN), she will purchase more assorted merchandise to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more products to stock her store.

loans.name: Roque

texts.es: Roque, de 58 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposa Josefina de 57 años y sus 04 estimados hijos a quienes le dedica amor y buena estadía. El señor Roque, es un hombre de provecho se dedica a labrar la tierra y después cultivar plantas de café, en tiempos de cosecha pide ayuda de sus vecinos para que le apoyen en extraer rápido los frutos y de esa manera elaborar el secado correspondiente para que luego los lleve a vender a os centros de acopio que se ubican a media hora de su localidad. Roque, se preocupa por siembras ya que desea obtener buenos resultados en las temporadas de cosecha. Hasta hoy con la ayuda de MFP le va muy bien en el desarrollo de sus plantas es por eso que siempre acude a los préstamos de los financieros para los buenos resultados de sus plantaciones. Este será su crédito número 14 con MFP, sabe que tiene que ser puntual en sus cuotas de pago. En su banco comunal es un socio respetuoso. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, contratará jornaleros para que le ayuden en el desmonte de su siembra.
texts.en:
Roque, 58, lives in his own house with his wife, Josefina, 57, and his four dear children for whom he provides love and a good place to stay. Sr. Roque is a hardworking man who tills the soil to plant coffee. At harvest time he asks his neighbors for help in quicky picking the coffee seeds and in drying them so that he can take them to sell in the collection centers located half an hour from his area.

Roque is concerned about his crop since he wants to have a good return during harvest season. Until now, with the help of MFP, his plants have developed very well. That is why he always comes for loans from lenders so that his coffee plantations will have high yields. This will be his 14th loan from MFP and he knows that he has to be punctual in making his payments. He is a respectful member of his communal bank. With the 1,000 nuevos soles, he will hire laborers to assist him in harvesting his crop.

loans.use: to hire laborers.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 42 años, es una mujer emprendedora y alegre, vive en su propia casa junto a sus 03 queridos hijos a quienes brinda amor y cuidado. Rosa, es una mujer hacendosa dedicada al salón de belleza que con tanto esfuerzo llego a obtener, al igual que su tienda de abarrotes y la venta de cosméticos que ofrece a sus clientes. Hace 12 años que empezó con estas actividades y comenta que le va muy bien con sus ventas; los clientes que acuden donde Rosa son personas que ya conocen de su labor; otros se acercan a su estética para poder cortarse el cabello o embellecerse un poco, al igual que compran sus productos de belleza; de la misma forma que acuden a su tienda de abarrotes para consumo de sus clientes. Para Rosa, al principio fue dificultoso pero ahora, que ya logro tener lo que mas deseaba pues ahora puede ver con tranquilidad sobre los gastos que surge su hogar. Este será su crédito número 02 con MFP y agradece a los financista por el apoyo brindado para lograr sus planes de trabajo. En su banco comunal es una socia muy entusiasta y solidaria. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará los productos necesarios para su negocio de ventas.
texts.en:
Rosa, 42, is a happy and hardworking woman. She lives in her own house with her three dear children, whom she loves and cares for. She is an industrious woman who has both a beauty salon that she was able to open with a great deal of effort, as well as a grocery door and she also sells cosmetics to her customers. She started these businesses 12 years ago and notes that her sales have gone very well. 

The customers that come to Rosa’s are people who already know of her work; some come because they want a hair-cut or to beautify themselves a bit and as well they buy her beauty products. In the same way they come to her grocery store, which she established to meet their needs.  At first, it was very difficult for Rosa but now that she has succeeded in having what she most wanted, she can view calmly the expenses that arise in her household. This will be loan number two with MFP and she is grateful to the lenders for the support provided her so that she can succeed in her work plans. 

Rosa is a very enthusiastic and supportive member of her communal bank. With the 1,000 nuevos soles, she will buy the products necessary for her sales business.

loans.use: to buy staple supplies to stock her store.

loans.name: Chroeb

texts.en:
Chroeb is 41 years old and her husband, Vandy, is 43 years old. They live in a village on the Mekong River about 10 miles north of Phnom Penh and they have four children: one son and three daughters. One is a construction worker, two have full-time employment and another is still young.  

Chroeb is a farmer, while her husband is a fisherman and he also does construction work when it is not the fishing season. Chroeb is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase a motorbike for her children to get to work because they commute to work by taking a bicycle.

In the photo, Chroeb is at home; not at the farm.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for her children to get work.

loans.name: Cilita

texts.es:
Cilita de 48 años de edad, es madre soltera con 2 hijos. Juntos viven en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito de pichari. Cilita es una madre trabajadora, ella se dedica al cultivo de cacao desde hace 25 años, ahora cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos. Al principio solo tenía una hectárea de plantaciones de cacao pero con el correr del tiempo fueron comprando más plantas para incrementar su parcela de cultivo.
Su producto final los vende en el mismo distrito, al acopiador que mejor precio le ofrezca. Pero, aparte de dedicarse al cultivo de cacao también cuenta con una pequeña carpintería que poco a poco esta creciendo, es por ello que mas adelante desea dedicarse por completo a este negocio por que en un menor tiempo ya le viene generando buenos ingresos. Este es su cuarto crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete una vez más en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Ella esta conforme con el trabajo que realizan en su banca comunal.
Con los 4, 000 nuevos soles comprará maderas para su carpintería, así como también realizará la poda de sus cultivos de cacao, por lo que contratará peones.
texts.en:
Cilita, 48 years old, is a single mother with two children. They live together in their own house, located in the Pichari district. Cilita is a hard-working mother. She has worked in cacao farming for 25 years, and now she has the help of her children. At the beginning, she only had a hectare of cacao crops, but over time she purchased more plants to expand her plot of crops.

She sells her final product in the same district, to the purchaser who offers her the best price. Besides her work farming cacao, however, she also has a small carpentry business that is growing little by little. This is why she would like, in the future, to dedicate herself completely to this business, since in a short time it is already generating good income for her. 

This is her fourth loan with MFP, and she is committed to making her payments on time once again. She is satisfied with the work that is done in her communal bank.

With the 4,000 nuevos soles (PEN), she will purchase wood for her carpentry business, as well as contract laborers to perform the pruning of her cacao crops.

loans.use: to contract laborers and purchase wood.

loans.name: Nusrat's Group

texts.en:
Nusrat has applied for a loan from Kiva's partner, Asasah, for her decorative embroidery business. With the loan, she will purchase beads, thread and embroidery frames to make better looking embroidered clothes and increase her profits. She is very skillful and receives regular orders every month. She is confident that by purchasing embroidery material in bulk, she will be able to improve her business and income.

Nusrat's husband is a furniture manufacturer and her two sons also work with him. Her daughters remain at home and help Nusrat with her routine tasks. Nusrat is a very hardworking lady and has lots of confidence in her abilities. She is very sure about her business success after investing the loan in it.

loans.use: to buy embroidery materials such as beads, thread, etc. for an embroidery business

loans.name: Alexander

texts.ru:
Александр живет и работает в Водяном. У него свое фермерское хозяйство. Александр выращивает овощи. У него 3 участка земли, один из которых он сдает в аренду. На втором стоят 3 большие теплицы, на третьем он устанавливает новую теплицу. Выращиванием овощей Александр занимается уже 6 лет. В хозяйство было вложено около 200 000 гривен. Затраты на семена и пленку составляют ежегодно 84 000 гривен. 

Александр планирует вложить полученные от КИВА средства в закупку угля для отопления теплиц. Александр недавно смог установить необходимое отопительное оборудование для своих теплиц, но теперь постоянно нужно закупать уголь для обогрева. Александр реалистично смотрит на свои перспективы. Он видит, что есть возможность развиваться еще, строить дополнительные теплицы и продолжать развиваться. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Alexander lives and works in Vodyanoye.  He has his own vegetable farm.  He has 3 pieces of land.  He rents out the first piece.  He has 3 large hothouses on the second piece, and he is building a new hothouse on the third piece.  Alexander has been growing vegetables for 6 years. He has about 200,000 hryven invested in his farm.  His yearly expenses for seed and hothouse film are about 84,000 hryven.

Alexander is planning to invest the funds he receives through Kiva in purchasing coal for heating the hothouses.  Recently, Alexander was able to install the necessary heating systems, but now he must constantly buy coal.  Alexander looks upon his prospects realistically.  He sees that there is the possibility to develop further, to build additional hothouses and continue to expand.  

Note: story in Russian

loans.use: to buy coal for heating his hothouses

loans.name: Efren  Antonio

texts.es:
Don Efrén tiene 56 años de edad, esta casado hace 40 años, tiene 2 hijos de 39 y 26 años de edad, los cuales ya son independientes, vive con su esposa en la Colonia Juan Avelar, Siguatepeque.
Don Efrén en busca de una fuente de ingresos con que vivir, hace 15 años decidió invertir y establecer un negocio de pulpería para vender productos alimenticios, como granos básicos (frijoles, arroz, harina, manteca, azúcar, maseca, huevos, café, lácteos, carnes, embutidos, productos enlatados, pan, pastillas etc.). Este lo inicio con sus propios esfuerzos y ha logrado surtir poco a poco.  A este negocio le dedica todo el día ayudado por su esposa. 
Solicito un crédito de 20,000 lempiras para abastecer su inventario con producto de la canasta básica como frijoles, arroz, harina, manteca, azúcar, maseca, huevos, café, lácteos, carnes, embutidos, etc. Para continuar vendiendo y darle un mejor servicio a los clientes.
El espera en el futuro próximo no tener que depender de los créditos sino trabajar su capital propio para surtir su negocio y  tener mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Efrén, age 56, has been married for 40 years.  He has two independent children, ages 39 and 26.  He lives with his wife in the Juan Avelar neighborhood in Siguatepeque.

Fifteen years ago when Efrén was looking for a source of income to live on, he decided to invest and establish a grocery store business where he would sell food products.  He would sell the basics (beans, rice, flour, shortening, eggs, coffee, dairy products, meat, sausages, canned goods, bread, and soup packets, etc.).   

He started it through his own efforts, and he has managed to gradually stock the store.  He devotes the whole day to this business, and he is helped by his wife.

He requested a loan for 20,000 lempiras to stock his inventory with basic needs products like beans, rice, flour, shortening, sugar, “maseca” (instant corn dough), eggs, coffee, dairy products, meat, and sausages, etc.  He will do this in order to continue selling and to give his customers better service.

He hopes that in the near future he will not have to depend upon loans.  He hopes to work with his own capital in order to stock his business and to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic needs products like beans, rice, flour, instant corn dough, salt, sugar, soft drinks, bread, eggs, meat, coffee, and sausages, etc.

loans.name: Rudy

texts.es: Rudy, de 22 años, una joven muy alegre y empeñosa, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Cristian de 30 años y su pequeña hija Ana de 06 años a quien estiman y desean una mejor calidad de vida. Rudy, es una mujer hogareña se dedica al cuidado de su familia y del trabajo que hace 10 años logro conseguir con la ayuda de su pareja y a su gran esfuerzo por sobresalir en la vida; Cristian, quien labora la reparación vehicular esta al tanto de mantener conforme a sus clientes por los buenos manejos que hace; Rudy se encarga de vender los repuestos vehiculares a precios cómodos. Sin embargo para ellos es difícil el no poder contar con los repuestos que a veces se requiere por emergencia por la necesidad de sus clientes. Desde que se enteró sobre los préstamos que efectúa MFP, pues no dudo en acercarse y solicitar para poder desarrollar con su trabajo. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, está dispuesta a pagar de forma puntual sus cuotas de pago para que en otra necesidad pueda acceder a otro crédito. En su banco comunal es una socia agradecida por la oportunidad de trabajar en grupo. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará repuestos de carro como: pernos, abrazaderas, entre otros.
texts.en: Twenty-two-year-old Rudy, a happy and hardworking young woman, lives in her own home with her partner, 30-year-old Cristian, and her six-year-old daughter, Ana.  She cares for both of them and wants a better quality of life for them.  Rudy is a stay-at-home mom who takes care of her family, works at a job that she was able to get 10 years ago with her partner's help, and makes a great effort to get ahead in life.  Cristian, who works repairing cars, keeps his clientele happy with the good work he does.  Rudy is in charge of selling spare car parts at reasonable prices.  However, it's difficult for them to not be able to count on having the spare parts they need sometimes in emergencies for their customers.  As soon as she found out about the loans MFP offers, she didn't hesitate to go and ask for one to be able to progress in her work.  This will be her first loan with MFP and she is prepared to make her payments on time so that she will be able to take out another loan if she needs one.  She is thankful for the opportunity to work in a group that her communal bank offers her.  With the 1,000 nuevos soles, she will buy car parts such as bolts and hose clamps, among others.

loans.use: to buy bolts and hose clamps for cars

loans.name: Lesya

texts.ru:
Последний кредит Леся брала для того, чтобы закупить обувь весеннего ассортимента. За счет дополнительных заемных средств ей удалось увеличить свой доход, расширений не было. Полученная прибыль была вложена в приобретение квартиры для сына в другом районе города, получилось обставить ее мебелью, купить стиральную машину и большой холодильник. 
Как обычно бывает у предпринимателей-рыночников, да и не только, январь и февраль самые худшие месяцы в плане выручки, просто обвал. Поэтому многие,  в том числе и Леся, снова обратилась за кредитной помощью. 
Сейчас Леся работает на 2 торговые точки, так как зима, а не лето, спрос не столь высокий. Но в скором времени она планирует открыть третью, дополнительную торговую точку.
texts.en:
Lesya took out her last loan to buy an assortment of spring shoes.  With the addition of her loaned funds, she was able to increase her income, but not expand her business.  The profit she earned was invested in an apartment for her son in a different region of the city.  She was also able to furnish it, buy a washing machine, and a large refrigerator.  

As usually happens with the entrepreneurs at the market, and not just with them, January and February are the worst months for revenues.  They simply drop of a cliff.  Because of this Lesya, like many others, again applied for assistance with financing. 

Right now, Lesya has two sales outlets open.  Demand isn't very high since it's only winter and not summer.  However, she is planning to open a third, supplemental sales outlet in the near future.

loans.use: to invest additional resources in inventory

loans.name: Serafina

texts.es:
Serafina, de 47 años, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Fabián de 44 años y sus queridos hijos; Dina de 21 años y Tabita de 14 años, a quienes brinda amor y cuidado.
Serafina, es una mujer de provecho se preocupa por el bienestar de su familia; es por ello que desde hace 20 años logró obtener su tienda de abarrotes que gracias a negocio, hoy puede solventar los gastos de su hogar; las personas que acuden al puesto de Serafina, saben que encontraran lo que necesiten, ya que siempre varia sus productos sin faltarle nada, de este modo mantiene conforme a sus principales clientes. Serafina se siente contenta con el negocio que tiene pero considera difícil al momento en su tienda llega a quedar vacía sin nada que ofrecer. Por lo tanto visita a las oficinas de MFP, para poder solicitar un préstamo que pueda obtener con los métodos de trabajo que Serafina realiza. Este será su crédito número 05 con MFP, se siente orgullosa por la confianza brindada y se compromete a realizar sus pagos puntualmente. Asimismo en su banco comunal es una activa y solidaria. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará productos para incrementar su tienda como: variedades de verduras, saco de arroz, azúcar, fideos, conservas, etc.
texts.en:
Forty-seven-year-old Serafina is a happy and hardworking woman.  She lives in her own home with her husband Fabian, who is 44, and her beloved children, 21-year-old Dina and 14-year-old Tabita, whom she loves and supports.

Serafina is a woman of great worth who takes care of her family.  That's why she started her grocery store 20 years ago and, thanks to this business, today she is able to cover her household expenses.  The people who come to Serafina's stand know that they will find what they need because she always changes up her products without running out of anything.  This is how she's able to keep her regular customers happy.  Serafina is happy with her business, but it will be difficult for her when her store is empty and she has nothing to sell.  That's why she went to MFP's offices, to ask for a loan that she could qualify for based on her work methods.  This will be her fifth loan with MFP and she is proud of the confidence they have shown in her.  She promises to make her payments on time.  She is also an active and supportive member of her communal bank.  With the 1,000 nuevos soles, she will buy products to stock her store, such as different kinds of vegetables, bags of rice, sugar, noodles, canned food, etc.

loans.use: to buy different kinds of vegetables, bags of rice, sugar, noodles, and canned foods.

loans.name: Gayane

texts.en:
Gayane is 42 years old. She lives in Yerevan with her son. Gayane started a sewing business in 2000, and during this period has successfully managed it by sewing dresses for women. Now Gayane needs a financial investment to purchase necessary materials and complete the current orders. With the requested loan, Gayane will purchase textiles.
 
Gayane hopes to continue to have a good number of orders and continue to generate income for her home. She hopes to provide better opportunities for her son in the future and insure a prosperous future for him.

loans.use: to pay for textiles.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to supplement his inventory of sport shoes

loans.name: Hoeun

texts.en:
Hoeun (in the photo) and her husband, Vuth, live on an island in the Mekong River about 15 km from Phnom Penh City. They have been married since 1997 and have three children who are in school. 

Hoeun sells vegetables. She buys vegetables under contract from farmers in her village and sells them in Phnom Penh market. Her husband assists his wife in the business and raises cows at home.

Hoeun is asking for a loan in the amount of $800 to buy additional vegetables for resale.

loans.use: To purchase vegetables under contract for resale.

loans.name: Nubar

texts.en:
Nubar is 55 years old. She lives in Artashat with her son, daughter-in-law and two grandchildren. Nubar has been trading fruits and vegetables for 3 years. 

Nubar plans to increase her sales and get more income.  For that, she needs to purchase more fruits and vegetables. This loan will give her the opportunity to implement her goal.  Nubar also plans to use the loan to renovate her premise. With the additional income, Nubar will be able to enlarge her business premise and develop her business. The income generation is vital for Nubar's family's economic stability.

loans.use: renovate her shop and buy fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Alvard

texts.en:
Alvard is a 28-year-old business woman from Yereavan. She lives with her husband, their little baby and her pensioner mother-in- law. Alvard works as a translator. Almost a year ago, she decided to start her own business and get financial independence.  Alvard started trading in women's jewelry and cosmetics and due to her quick wit, kept stable the growth of her business. 

Now Alvard needs some financial investments to increase the inventory variety in her shop. She plans to purchase new varieties of jewelry and cosmetics.  Alvard will increase her sales and get additional income, which will allow her to insure the financial stability for her family.

loans.use: buy jewelry and cosmetics

loans.name: Elena

texts.es:
Elena de 42 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 5 hijos de 14, 12, 10,5 y 2 años de edad de los cuales solo los mayores estudian y vive con ellos en la Colonia Gran Villa, Puerto Cortes.
La actividad económica de Elena es la elaboración de tortillas de maíz, tamalitos de maíz y elotes cocidos. Inicio su negocio hace tres años por sus propios medios con la necesidad de sacar sus hijos adelante. Ella vende su producto de manera ambulante y por encargo ya que es muy reconocida en la zona tiene la ventaja de vender más. Para obtener los ingresos necesarios para el sustento de su hogar trabaja muy duro desde las 7: 00 de la mañana hasta la 4:00 de la tarde. 
Elena ha solicitado un préstamo de 5,000 lempiras para invertir en la compra de maíz y leña para la elaboración de sus tortillas y tamalitos de maíz. Con el afán de seguir trabajando y ofreciendo a sus clientes sus ricos productos. 
Espera aumentar sus ventas para tener una solvencia económica que le facilite darles la educación necesaria a sus hijos que dependen de ella.
texts.en:
Elena is 42 years old, a single mother, and has five children who are 14, 12, 10, 5 and 2 years old. The eldest children are in school. She lives with them in the neighborhood of Gran Villa, Puerto Cortes. 

Elena has a business making corn tortillas, corn tamales and cooked corn on the cob. She started her business three years ago through her own means because she needed to get her children ahead. She sells her products door to door and to order. Since she is very well known in the area she has the advantage of selling more. In order to make the income necessary to sustain her home, she works very hard from 7:00 in the morning until 4:00 in the afternoon. 

Elena has requested a loan of 5,000 lempiras to invest in the purchase of corn and fire wood to make her corn tortillas and tamales. She is eager to continue working and offering her delicious products to her customers. 

She hopes to increase her sales in order to be financially solvent which will help her to give her children the education necessary as they are dependent on her.

loans.use: to buy corn and fire wood to make to make tortillas and corn tamales.

location.town: Colonia La Gran Villa, Puerto Cortes.

loans.name: Tigran

texts.en:
Tigran is 43 years old. He lives with his wife and two children. Tigran works as a veterinary surgeon and also runs a farm where he breeds pigs and cows. His main income comes from selling meat and milk in the regional center - Kapan. 

Tigran has applied for this loan to purchase cattle and forage. This will allow him to earn more income. Tigran plans to use the profit to renovate his house, which means higher living standards for his children.

loans.use: buy cattle and forage

loans.name: Saeda

texts.en:
Saeda is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Kathem appears in her Kiva profile photo.

Saeda is a mother with three sons.  Her husband is a Palestinian National Authority employee who gets a small salary, but that is not enough to cover the family's needs and costs.   

Saeda is requesting a 1,500 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the expenses needed to complete finishing her house, such as installing tiles, installing windows and doors, and painting. This will improve her family's house and provide her family better living conditions.

loans.use: finish building her house

loans.name: Gayane

texts.en:
Gayane is 53 years old. She lives in Yerevan with her 4 children. Gayane trades in curtains, bedding accessories and textile materials.  She is an honest and very hard-working woman. Due to her hard work, Gayane was able to keep a stable growth for her business and sustain her children.
 
Gayane needs some financial investments to enlarge her inventory variety. She plans to use this loan to purchase more curtains.  Gayane expects to increase her sales and earn more income, which means improved living conditions for her children.

loans.use: by curtains

loans.name: Vardan

texts.en:
Vardan is 34 years old. He lives in Getap village with his wife, daughter, and brother. Vardan earns his living by breeding cattle and keeping beehives. 

Vardan is a very hard-working person, and due to this he has expanded his farm through the years.  He now has 2 cows and 15 beehives.  Vardan wants to increase the number of cattle by purchasing a cow.  Vardan has a barn and forage to feed the cattle, so he hopes to increase his income from agriculture and insure a prosperous life for his family.

loans.use: pay for a cow

location.town: Getap village of Vayots Dzor region

loans.name: Tahir

texts.en:
Tahir is a 46-year-old married man with two children.  Tahir has been breeding cattle for last 10 years. After several attempts to find a job he gave up and decided to start his own business. With the help of his wife, he purchased their first cattle.

Tahir usually buys small calves, raises and fattens them for 5-6 months and then resells them for more profitable prices in the livestock bazaar. His monthly income is 230 AZN.  This business is the only source of financial income for his family. 

Beef is in very high demand in Azerbaijan and people use it in everyday dishes like pilau and dolma.  Tahir wants to expand his business and improve the living conditions for his family. He applied for 1000 AZN loan to purchase two heads of cattle and more fodder.

loans.use: buy cattle and fodder

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy snacks, spices, etc. for grocery store business

loans.name: Shameem's Group

texts.en:
Shameem is 48 years old, married and a mother of a 26-year-old son. He is a truck driver and delivers goods from one place to another. Her husband has also been involved in the transportation business for many years.

Shameem is a seamstress who sews clothes for her neighboring clients. She is very skillful in her work and receives regular orders every month. She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her sewing business. With the loan investment, she will buy a new sewing machine because with her current machine she is unable to finish the orders on time.

She has been operating her business for the past many years and is confident that a new sewing machine will help her do her business better.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Noreen's Group

texts.en:
Noreen is a mother of 5 daughters and a son. Four of the children are studying.  She is a housewife, sews clothes for her neighboring clients and earns income for her family. She also sells a different variety of clothes to her neighboring clients.  She purchases these at wholesale prices. Her eldest daughter does sewing as well, and supports her in finishing the client orders on time. Her husband is a driver by profession and provides transportation services to his passengers.

Noreen has applied for a loan from KIVA partner, Asasah, for her clothes business.  With the loan investment, she will purchase clothes in bulk quantity. That will allow her to target more clients and increase her sales and profits.  She is very experienced in her work and has been operating it for the past many years. She is confident that her business will improve further after making use of the loan.

loans.use: To buy clothes for clothes business

loans.name: Nazia's Group

texts.en:
Nazia is married and has 4 children. She is unable to provide education facilities to her children due to poor financial conditions.
She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner, Asasah, for her knitting business.  With the loan investment, she will purchase wool and other related material in larger quantity.  That will allow her to knit a larger quantity of sweaters and to sell them for higher profits.
She is very experienced and has received a great number of orders to fill. She is confident that by investing the loan into her business, she will be able to fill those orders on time and increase her income.
Note:"In the photo, the lady holding a book, called Asasah Passbook, is Nazia."

loans.use: To buy wool for knitting business

loans.name: Emin

texts.en:
Emin is 30 years old and married with two children. He raises fruits and vegetables in his garden and has been doing it for the last four years. He is a very experienced farmer and has deep knowledge of his land and how to operate it. He was not able to find a job for several years and than decided to start his own business. 
 
Emin usually raises seasonal fruits and vegetables and sells them for a profitable price in the central bazaar. Fresh fruits and vegetables are very popular and in high demand because people prefer to eat them every day and consider them very healthy. Also, one of the favorite national dishes, Dolma, is made of fresh eggplants, peppers and tomatoes. Fresh juices are most likely made from fresh fruits. His monthly income from this business is 250 AZN. This is the only source of income in his family.

Now Emin would like to invest more capital in his business and purchase seeds and fertilizers. For this purpose, he applied for a loan of 1,000 AZN. This is his only source of income for his family and hopes this loan will improve the life of his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Ilqar

texts.en:
Ilqar is a 45-year-old married man with two daughters. He is a market vendor and sells different kind of goods such as flour, beverages, macaronis, butter and candies. He has 10 years of experience and has deep knowledge of the market and demand of clients. 

The food products he sells is very popular among people and are in high demand. His monthly profit from selling foods is 350 AZN.  His wife helps to purchase products and bring them the shop. This is the sole source of financial income for his family. Ilqar is a very successful entrepreneur because of his good location, in the central bazaar of his home town.

Ilqar  applied for 1000  AZN in loan to purchase and diversify his range of food products to cover customers' demand.  This will be his second loan and he has a good client history.

loans.use: buy more food products

loans.name: Rani's Group

texts.en:
Rani has requested a loan from KIVA partner, Asasah, for her brother-in-law’s business. He lives with Rani's family and drives an Auto-rickshaw, by which he provides transport services to his passengers, including school children. With the loan investment, he will buy a rickshaw body and will also repair his auto-rickshaw.   This will help him provide better quality transportation services to his passengers and will increase his income.

Rani has a 6 year-old son who has not started his education yet.  She is an embroidery expert and works for her neighboring clients. She has great skills in her work and prepares beautiful-looking embroidered clothes and charges very reasonable rates. She is very hopeful that the loan will be productive for her brother-in-law and will improve his income.
Note:"In the photo, the lady raising her hand is Rani."

loans.use: To repair auto-rickshaw for transportation business

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es:
Yanet, de 31 años, es una joven soltera con las ganas de sobresalir adelante para que tenga un buen futuro, vive en su propia casa junto a su pequeña hija de 02 meses. Yanet, es una joven muy alegre, gracias a su gran esfuerzo hoy es una profesional que con ansias deseaba ser; hace 08 años realiza la labor de enfermera en el centro de salud de la ciudad de Kimbiri, al cuidado de sus pobladores.
Con el tiempo desea en abrir su propia farmacia en la que pueda atender a sus clientes manteniéndolos saludables; y estar al pendiente de su hija que hace 02 meses ocupa una gran responsabilidad de ser madre. Es por ello que acude a MFP para solicitar un préstamo en la que pueda hacer realidad sus objetivos. Este será su crédito número 04 con MFP, se siente motivada de seguir adelante por el apoyo brindado y promete no descuidar los pagos puntuales de su cuota. En su banco comunal es una socia participe de los acuerdos que deciden sus compañeros.
Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, podrá comprar medicinas como: pastillas, jarabes, ampollas, etc. Y de esa forma abrirá su propia farmacia.
texts.en:
Yanet, 31 years of age, is a young single woman who wants to get ahead in life so that she has a good future. She lives in her own home with her two month old daughter. Yanet is a very happy young person and thanks to her efforts, today she is a professional, something that she always wished to be. For eight years she has worked as a nurse in the health center in the city of Kimbiri, taking care of its inhabitants.

In time, she wants to open her own pharmacy where she can assist her customers in maintaining their health and to take care of her daughter, since two months ago she became a mother, which is a big responsibility. For this reason, she comes to MFP to request a loan so that she can achieve her goals. This will be her fourth loan with MFP. She feels motivated to get ahead in life because of the support that MFP offers and she promises not to neglect making her payments on time. In her communal bank, she is an active member, in accordance with the group's agreement. With the 1,000 nuevos soles, she will be able to buy medicines such as pills, syrups, vials, etc, and in this way, she will open her own pharmacy.

loans.use: purchase pills, syrups, and vials to establish her own pharmacy.

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
Alejandrina, de 43 años, es una mujer trabajadora y responsable, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Cesar de 45 años y sus 05 queridos hijos a quienes desea brinda una mejor calidad de vida. Alejandrina, es una mujer perseverante y luchadora, se dedica a la venta de Agroquímicos; gracias al esfuerzo de seguir adelante, hoy, cuenta con su negocio donde atiende con mucha alegría para los pobladores de la comunidad de Roca, un pueblo alejado de la ciudad de Kimbiri; Alejandrina, logra vender sus productos químicos a los agricultores que siempre están al tanto de sus cultivos y piden consejo a la señora Alejandrina para que les apoye como poder mantener sanos sus siembras. Sin embargo le consta que también hay dificultades al no poder tener los fertilizantes agroquímicos. Por ende acude a MFP para solicitar un préstamo y de esa forma pueda abastecerse de sus productos. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, se compromete a pagar de forma puntual sus cuotas, para que en otra oportunidad logre acceder a otro. En su banco comunal es una socia alegre y responsable.
Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará insecticidas, funguicidas, abonos, entre otros.
texts.en:
Alejandrina, 43 years old, is a hardworking and responsible woman. She lives in her own home with her husband, Cesar, who is 45 years old, and their 5 beloved children. She wishes to provide them with a better quality of life.

Alejandrina is a determined and persevering woman. She makes a living selling agrochemicals. Due to her efforts to move forward, today she has her business, where she cheerfully serves the residents of the Roca community, a town away from the city of Kimbiri. Alejandrina sells her chemicals to farmers who are concerned with their crops and who seek advice from her to learn how to keep their plantings healthy.However, she knows that there are difficulties when she can't supply the agrochemical fertilizers. Thus, she come to MFP to apply for a loan and thereby she can stock her products. 

This will be her first loan with MFP. She agrees to pay her dues in a timely manner so that in time she can have the opportunity to take out another loan. In her community bank, she is a cheerful and responsible partner. With the 1000 nuevos soles (local currency), she will buy insecticides, fungicides, and fertilizer, among others.

loans.use: to purchase insecticides, fungicides, and fertilizer

loans.name: Sabran's Group

texts.en:
Sabran has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her grocery-store business. She will utilize the loan in her business and purchase salt, spices and other grocery items in bulk quantities that will allow her to fulfill the clients' needs and increase her sales and profits.

She is very experienced in her work and has been operating it for many years. She is confident that her business will have more success after investing the loan.

She is also a great wife and mother. Her family is very happy with her management abilities. She is confident that her family’s living conditions will be improved after investing the loan in her business.

Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Sabran.

loans.use: To buy grocery items like spices, cooking oils, etc., for the grocery-selling business.

loans.name: Kalsoom's Group

texts.en:
Kalsoom is a great mother. She has given birth to a son and 4 daughters. Her eldest son and elder daughter work to financially contribute to the family. Kalsoom has worked very hard throughout her life to raise her children. 
She herself is also a seamstress and sews clothes for her neighboring clients. She is very creative in her work and makes beautiful looking clothes for her clients and charges very reasonable rates.
She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah to purchase a new sewing machine for the improvement of her business. By doing that, she will be able to fulfill client orders on time and increase her profits.
She is an experienced working lady and has been operating her business for many years. She is confident that her business will be improved further by investing the funds from the loan.
Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Kalsoom.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine for her sewing business

loans.name: Mbuvi

texts.en: Mbuvi is 40 years old, married with 5 children. He does kale farming to earn a living. He has been in the business for 6 years and has employed two people. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able save his income and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy fertilizer and kale seeds.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and kale seeds

loans.name: Hajraan

texts.en:
Hajraan has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s mobile items shop. He is an expert in mobile repairing and his customers trust his repairing skills very much. 
With the loan investment, he will buy mobile repairing tools, accessories, new and used mobiles for selling through his shop.
Hajraan is very confident that her husband will be able to improve his business successfully by utilizing the loan in a positive way.
Hajraan is an embroidery expert and prepares precious embroidered clothes for her clients.
She has given birth to 7 children. 3 of them work and 3 are studying while her youngest son is only 3 years old and hasn’t started his education yet.
Hajraan is very hopeful about her family’s better financial future as a result of her husband’s business improvement.

loans.use: To buy mobile phones, accessories, and repairing tools for mobile items shop.

loans.name: Naseem's Group

texts.en:
Naseem is a sewing expert. She is very artistic and prepares beautiful looking clothes for her community clients and earns regular income every month.
She has given birth to 2 sons and a daughter. All of them are continuing their education by attending a nearby school.
She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for further improvement of her sewing business. With the loan investment, she will buy a new sewing machine that will allow her to complete the orders in a shorter period of time and increase her profits.
She is very experienced in her work and has been operating her business for many years. She is confident that her business will become more profitable after investing the loan funds.
Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Naseem.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine for her sewing business

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is 44 years old, married with 3 children. He does quarrying to earn a living. He has been in the business for 3 years and has employed two people. He does maize farming to earn extra income. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standard and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to rent land for quarrying and quarrying tools.

loans.use: To rent land for quarrying and buy quarrying tools

loans.name: Sope Serign Babacar Group

texts.fr:
Arame est une femme mariée âgée de 34 ans et mère de 5 enfants .
Elle est  membre du BV depuis son inauguration et fait parti du groupe de solidarité Sope Serign Babacar.
Le dit groupe a été crée depuis le premier cycle du BV et regroupe 7 membres du même village ayant de valeurs sociales communes.
Arame debout à gauche de la photo est responsable de son groupe .Elle fait du commerce dans la vente de de poissons  séchés et fumés .
Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience dans ce domaine pour l'avoir pratiqué pendant plusieurs années. 
Avec son nouveau crédit de 200 000 francs CFA elle va acheter 10 paniers de poissons fumés et 5 de poissons séchés qu'elle va revendre au niveau de son village.
Avec ses bénéfices elle va payer du riz de l'huile et du sucre pour sa famille.
texts.en:
Arame is a 34-year-old woman.  She is married and the mother of 5 children.

She has been a member of the BV (Banc Villageois) since its inception and is a member of the Sope Serign Babacar solidarity group. This group has been in existence since the first cycle of the BV, and consists of 7 members from the same village who share common social values.  Arame, standing at the far left in the photo, is the group's representative.  She sells dried and smoked fish.  She has a good experience in this field, since she has been involved in this activity for several years.

With her new loan of 200,000 CFA francs, she will buy 10 baskets of smoked fish and 5 baskets of dried fish, which she will resell in her village.

With the profits, she will buy rice, oil and sugar for her family.

loans.use: to buy smoked and dried fish.

loans.name: Rasheeda's Group

texts.en:
Rasheeda is married and the mother of five children. All of them do different kinds of work to contribute financially to the family.

Rasheeda also sews clothes for her community clients. She receives regular orders every month due to her good quality work. Her husband operates a horse cart and provides loading and transportation services to his customers.

Rasheeda has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband, who will buy a young horse for the improvement of his business. This will help him to provide better quality loading and transport services to his customers, and to increase his profits.

He is very experienced in his business and Rasheeda is confident that his business will be further improved after investing the loan.

loans.use: To buy a horse for a transport and loading business.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth, de 36 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Félix de 50 años y sus 04 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Elizabeth, es una mujer alegre y luchadora, se preocupa por el bienestar de su familia; hace 25 años que se dedica al labrar la tierra para después cultivar plantas de café. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo, hijos y de algunos jornaleros quienes le ayudan a extraer los frutos de manera rápida. Para después llevarlas a vender a la ciudad de San Francisco, donde se encuentran lo centros de acopio que le remuneran buenas ganancias por cada kilogramo de café. Por lo tanto lo que prioriza ahora es poder sembrar plantas de cacao para que pueda incrementar en su parcela. Este será su crédito número 10 con MFP, sabe que tiene que ser puntual con las cuotas de pago para que en otra oportunidad pueda acceder a otra solicitud de préstamo. En su banco comunal es una socia muy activa y responsable.
Con los 2,500 nuevos soles, comprará plantas de café.
texts.en:
Elizabeth, 36 years-old, lives in her home with her husband Félix who's 50 years-old and their 4 beloved children to whom she wishes to give a better quality of life. Elizabeth is a happy and determined woman who worries about the well-being of her family. She's been making a living working the land to then grow coffee plants for 25 years. During harvest times, she relies on the support of her husband, children, and some day laborers to help her extract the fruits quickly to then take them to sell in the city of San Francisco where the warehouses are located that pay her well for each kilogram of coffee. Therefore now her priority is to be able to cultivate cocoa plants so that she can increase her land. This will be her tenth loan with MFP. She knows that she has to be punctual with her payments so that she will be able to access another loan request at another time. She is a very active and responsible member of her communal bank.

She will buy coffee plants with the 2,500 nuevos soles.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants.

loans.name: Elva

texts.es:
Elva, de 25 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Sergio de 28 años y su pequeña hija Linda de 06 años, a quien desean una buena estadía. Elva, una mujer de provecho dedicada a su trabajo en los campos de cultivo donde le dedica suficiente cuidado a su siembra de café; ya que su familia depende de la obtención de sus frutos. Lo que mas le gusta de trabajo es poder realizar junto a su esposo e hijos quienes le dan moción para seguir adelante con la obtención de las  plantas de café, a la vez considera difícil sobre las breñas que llegan crecen en medio de las plantas de sus sembradíos. Hasta ahora cuenta con el apoyo de los financistas de MFP ya que ellos apoyan la manera como trabaja Elva en su campo de cultivo. Este será su crédito número 04 con MFP, y será muy responsable como siempre, además está conforme con el trabajo de su banco comunal porque son personas responsables.
Con los 500 nuevos soles, comprará abono para cuidar sus plantaciones.
texts.en:
Elva, 25 years-old, lives in her home with her partner Sergio who's 28 years-old and their young daughter Linda who's 6 years-old and to whom they want to give a good life.

Elva is a hardworking woman who's dedicated to her work in the fields where she devotes care to her coffee crop since her family depends on obtaining its fruits. What she likes most about her work is to be able to do it with her husband and children who give her the energy to continue forward with what they obtain from the coffee plants. At the same time she considers the land with undergrowth that grow in between the plants of her sown field difficult. Until now she relies on the support of the financiers of MFP since they support the way she works in her fields. This will be her fourth loan with MFP and she will be very responsible as always. Moreover she is satisfied with the work of her communal bank because they are responsible people.

With the 500 nuevos soles she will buy fertilizer to take care of her fields.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Elver

texts.es:
Elver, es un hombre muy laborioso, tiene 25 años de edad, vive en su propia casa junto a su  pareja  y su querido hijo Jairo de 04 años. Elver, es un joven de provecho se dedica a labrar la tierra para luego sembrar plantas de café, actividad que realiza hace mas de 10 años. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de sus vecinos; de esa manera extrae rápido los frutos parar luego ser compradas en las empresas acopiadoras, quienes le pagan buena ganancia por cada kilogramo de café que llega a venderlas. De la misma  forma que le resulta difícil transportar sus sacos de cosecha desde su chacra hasta los centros de acopio ubicado en la ciudad de San Francisco. Para mas adelante prioriza en comprar nuevas tierras. Este será su crédito número 03 con MFP y está muy agradecido por haberle apoyado con reiterados créditos, ya que para él fueron de gran apoyo para que siga trabajando.
Con los 500 nuevos soles, comprará plantas de café para sembrar en su parcela.
texts.en:
Elver is a very hardworking man. He's 25 years-old and lives in his home with his partner and their beloved son Jairo who's 4 years-old. Elver is a hardworking young adult who makes a living working the land to then plant coffee plants, an activity he's been doing for more than 10 years. During harvest times he relies on the support of his neighbors. In this way he quickly extracts the fruits to then be sold in the warehouses where they pay him a good earning for each kilogram of coffee that he sells them. In this same way it is difficult for him to transport his sacks of harvest from his small farm to the warehouses located in the city of San Francisco. In the future he prioritizes buying new land. This will be his third loan with MFP and he is very grateful that they have helped him with repeated loans since they were a great support for him so that he could keep working.

With the 500 nuevos soles he will be buy coffee plants to grow in his lot.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is 34 years old and married with three children. 

She runs a grocery store to earn a living. She has been in this business for 13 years and describes her business environment as competitive because many people are in the same business. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to grow her business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 70,000 Kenya Shillings to buy tomatoes, potatoes and onions to sell.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, potatoes and onions to sell.

loans.name: Nhor's Group

texts.en:
Nhor is a 61-year-old father of three children, two of whom are still dependent.  He earns a living through cultivating rice and plantain as his main source of income.  Having been in this business for almost 30 years, he manages to earn US $3 per day and saves only US $1 each day. 

Nhor has been with VisionFund for several years and has completely paid back his previous loan.  The previous loan helped him afford to renovate his home into a decent house.  Now he is requesting a loan with his group member. He will use this loan to buy fertilizer for his farmland.  He hopes to make a better living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for his farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Eudosia

texts.es: Eudosia, de 27 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su pequeña y estimada hija Jocelyn de 10 años, a quien dedica todos sus esfuerzos. Eudosia, gracias a todos sus esfuerzos, hoy tiene su negocio de  abarrotes, donde le va de la mejor manera, además sus ventas vienen mejorando con respecto a los anteriores, a pesar de ello trata de mejorar su tienda de abarrotes con la necesidad de que pueda atraer clientes. Eudosia trabaja por cuenta propia en su tienda, ubicada en la localidad de Roca un pueblo donde no hay mucha competencia con los negocios. Su plan a futuro es tener comprar productos de abarrotes para incrementar en su tiendo y de esa forma surtir sus productos. Este será su crédito número 06 con MFP, por el cual se compromete a seguir cumpliendo con su cronograma de pagos, además esta conforme con su banco comunal, ya que todos son solidarios. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará mercaderías con el propósito de que pueda abastecer su negocio de abarrotes.
texts.en: Eudosia, 27 years old, lives in her own house along with her small and esteemed daughter, Jocelyn, 10, to whom she dedicates all of her efforts. Eudosia, thanks to all of her effort, today has a grocery business, which is going the best way, and, in addition, her sales are improving compared to previous ones. Despite this, she tries to improve her grocery store with the need of being able to attract customers. Eudosia works on her own in the store, located in the town of Roca, a town where there is not a lot of competition among businesses. Her plan for the future is to buy grocery products to increase in her store and, in this way, stock her products. This will be her sixth loan with MFP, for which she promises to continue making her payments on time. In addition, this conforms with her community bank since all of them are united. With the 1,000 new "soles", she will buy merchandise with the purpose that she can stock her grocery store.

loans.use: to purchase products to stock her shop.

loans.name: Chuija Group

texts.es: La señora Magdalena es casada, tiene 37 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 4 hijos 1 de los cuales esta estudiando, se dedica ala producción de ponchos,
texts.en: Magdalena is married and is 37 years old. She did not have the opportunity to study. She has four children, one of whom is studying. She is dedicated to making ponchos.

loans.use: to purchase fabric to make ponchos.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es: Luisa, de 44 años, es una mujer laboriosa, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Víctor, de 46 años y sus 05 amados hijos, quienes apoyan a su linda madre por seguir adelante. Hace 20 años que la señora Luisa, se dedica a la siembra de plantas de café; actividad que realiza con mucho esfuerzo y de este modo pueda tener buena producción en los tiempos de cosecha; Luisa junto a sus esposo y sus hijos se dirigen desde tempranas horas a ver el crecimiento de sus plantas como también realizan el mantenimiento. Por otra parte, lo que más anhela es incrementar su siembra ya que son muy rentables al vender sus frutos. Es por ello que acude a MFP para solicitar un préstamo que le brinde la ayuda de poder mantener productivas su siembra. Este será su crédito número 04 con MFP, esta dispuesta a ser puntual con sus cuotas de pago; asimismo, en su banco comunal es una socia solidaria y responsable. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, podrá comprar abono, fungicidas; para realizar el mantenimiento de sus plantas de café.
texts.en: Luisa, 44 years old, is a hard-working woman. She lives in her own house along with her husband, Victor, 46, and their 5 dear children who support their beautiful mother to get ahead. For 20 years Luisa has been dedicated to planting coffee plants, an activity that she performs with a lot of effort. In this way, she can have good production at harvest time. Luisa, along with her husband and their children, leave at early hours to see the growth of their plans as well as to conduct maintenance. Moreover, what she longs for the most is to increase her planting since it is very profitable to sell the fruit. It is for this that she approached MFP to request a loan that provides the help to be able to maintain the products of her planting. This will be her fourth loan with MFP. She is ready to be punctual with her payments. At the same time, in her community bank, she is a responsible and united member. With the 2,000 new "soles" she will be able to buy fertilizer, fungicide to maintain her coffee plants.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and fungicide.

loans.name: Gervasio

texts.es:
Gervasio, de 47 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposa, Silvestre de 41 años y sus 03 queridos hijos; Tulio de 20 años, Karina de 15 años y Lucy de 07 años, quienes apoyan a sus padres por el gran esfuerzo que hacen por salir adelante. Gervasio, es un hombre de bien, se dedica al cultivo de café, cuyos frutos le brindan buenas ganancias en los tiempos de cosecha, Gervasio, comenta que gracias al esfuerzo que día a día esta desempeñando, hoy tiene varias hectáreas de café cultivado. Sin embargo le resulta difícil transportar sus sacos de cosecha desde la chacra hasta  los centros de acopio. Pero ahora lo mas prevalece es comprar plantas de café para ampliar la siembra y de esa manera aumentar su producción y por ende obtener una buena estabilidad económica. 
Este será su crédito número 08 con MFP, esta dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que desea acceder a otro crédito mas adelante. En su banco comunal es un socio muy puntual.
Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, contratará jornaleros para que le apoyen a sacar las malezas que aquejan sus plantas.
texts.en: Gervasio, 47, lives in his own house along with his wife, Silvestre, 41, and their three dear children: Tulio 20, Karina 15, and Lucy 7, who support their parents for the great effort they make to get ahead. Gervasio is a good man who is dedicated to growing coffee, whose fruits provide good earnings at harvest time. Gervasio notes that, thanks to the effort that he puts forth day after day, today he has various hectares of grown coffee. Nevertheless, it is difficult to transport his harvest sacks from the farm to the collection centers. But now what prevails the most is to buy coffee plants to expand his planting and, in this way, expand production and obtain good economic stability. This will be his eighth loan with MFP. He is ready to pay all of his payments punctually since he wishes to request another loan in the future. In his community bank, he is a very punctual member. With the 1,000 new "soles", he will hire workers to support him in removing the weeds that plague his plants.

loans.use: to hire workers.

loans.name: Horacio

texts.es: Horacio es  un hombre muy laborioso y responsable, tiene 38 años, vive en su casa muy lejana, lugar muy apropiado para su actividad que realiza. Horacio, es un hombre de lucro que brinda esmero sembrar  plantaciones de café, actividad que realiza hace mas de 20 años. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de jornaleros, de esa manera extrae rápido los frutos para luego venderlas en los centros de acopio, quienes le gratifican buena ganancia por cada kilogramo de café. Horacio, es un joven que también apoya  a su hermano con los gastos de su estudio que gracias a su ayuda podrá tener su titulo profesional que a Horacio le hubiera gustado tener. Ahora lo que prioriza es poder realizar el mantenimiento de sus plantas es decir abonando sus plantones  ya que de la misma manera pueda tener buenos resultado en sus próximas cosechas. Este será su crédito número 03 con MFP y está muy contento por los resultado de sus inversiones y por la responsabilidad de sus compañeras de su grupo solidario,  por eso es muy responsable en sus pagos. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, ayudará con los gastos educativos de su hermano.
texts.en: Horacio is a very hard-working and responsible man. He is 38 years old and lives in his house very far away, very appropriate for the work he performs. Horacio is a man of benefit who provides care to coffee plants, an activity that he has done for more than 20 years. During harvest times, he has the support of workers, and in this way he quickly extracts the fruits to later sell in the collection centers where he is gratified by the good earnings for every kilogram of coffee. Horacio is a young man who also supports his brother with his educational expenses who, thanks to his support, will be able to have a professional title that Horacio would have liked to have. Now, what he has prioritized is to be able to maintain his plants, fertilizing his plants since  in this way he can have a good result for the next harvest. This will be his third loan with MFP and he is very happy with the results of his investments and with the responsibility of his colleagues in his group. For this, he is very responsible with his repayments. With the 2,000 new "soles" he will help with this brother's educational expenses.

loans.use: to purchase educational material for his brother.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel, de 29 años vive junto a su pareja Mario de 38 años y sus 02 queridos hijos; Gaby de 10 años y Eliana de 05 años quienes son el principal motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. Isabel, tiene mucho conocimiento sobre la agricultura que gracias a sus padres que le inculcaron desde pequeña hoy, tiene su propio campo de cultivo con hermosas plantas de café y los frutos bien robustos; esta actividad lleva realizando hace 18 años y considera que lo mas difícil es tener que transportar sus sacos de cosecha a los centro de acopio ubicada en la ciudad de San Francisco. Isabel, menciona, que le resulta fácil tener productivas las plantas de café gracias al esfuerzo que dedica a sus plantaciones; es por ello que acude a los préstamos de MFP para completar sus planes de trabajo. Este será su crédito número 02 con MFP, se compromete a pagar puntual todas las cuotas para que en otra oportunidad logre acceder a otra. En su banco comunal es una socia solidaria. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, contratará jornaleros para que le apoyen en la cosecha de su café.
texts.en: Isabel, 29, lives with her partner, Mario who is 28 years old, and their two dear children: Gaby 10 and Eliana 5, who are the main motivation for all of their efforts. Isabel has a lot of knowledge around agriculture thanks to her parents who taught her when she was young. Today, she has her own farm with beautiful coffee plants and robust fruit. She has been performing this work for 18 years and considers the most difficult part is to have to transport her harvest bags to the collection center located in the city of San Francisco. Isabel mentions that it is easy for her to have productive coffee plants thanks to the effort she dedicates to her farm. It is for this that she has requested a loan from MFP to complete her work plans. This will be her second loan with MFP. She promises to make all her payments punctually so that, at another opportunity, she can obtain another loan. In her community bank, she is a loyal member. With the 1,000 new "soles" she will hire workers to support her with the harvest of her coffee.

loans.use: to hire workers.

loans.name: Josue

texts.es:
Josue, de 32 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposa Áurea de 29 años y su pequeño hijo Edin de 07 años; a quien desean brindar una buena estadía. Josue, es un hombre de lucro, se dedica al cultivo de café; durante 15 años realiza esta actividad que gracias a ello pudo obtener su propia casa. 
Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es poder ver sus plantas muy productivas después del arduo esfuerzo que da de su persona y considera difícil que los tiempos de lluvia, porque aparecen plagas que afectan sus plantones; sin embargo el no deja de luchar por tener otro terreno con cultivos de café. Su plan a futuro es poder tener una mejor calidad de vida para su familia. Este será su crédito número 08 con MFP, por el cual se compromete a ser puntual con  sus pagos. En su banco es un socio cabal. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará un terreno para incrementar sus plantas.
texts.en:
